title: Define and explain how civil society thrives

content.question: 6. Many scholars think that civil society is important for the development of democracy. (a) Define civil society. (b) Identify and explain one specific condition within a political system that would enable civil society to thrive. (c) Identify and explain another specific condition within a political system that would enable civil society to thrive.

frqParts.text: 6. Many scholars think that civil society is important for the development of democracy. (a) Define civil society. (b) Identify and explain one specific condition within a political system that would enable civil society to thrive. (c) Identify and explain another specific condition within a political system that would enable civil society to thrive.

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
